dcterms:description: The Chinese Standard Mandarin Speech Corpus (CSMSC) contains 10,000 recorded sentences read by a female speaker, totaling 12 hours of natural speech with phoneme-level Textgrid annotations and text transcriptions.
dcterms:title: Chinese Standard Mandarin Speech Corpus (CSMSC)
